summary: What is the JuJu Genie Club?
paragraph: The JuJu Genie Club is a collection of 10,000 unique 3D Genies on the Ethereum    blockchain. Those who are lucky enough to hold one may have their wishes granted.
The public mint is scheduled for 8:30 PM EST on July 16th, opening 15 minutes    early for OGenie's.
10,000. First mint free (1/wallet) any additional 0.0069 ETH (no limit).

summary: What charity is the JuJu Genie Club donating to?
paragraph: We are donating 10% of our mint revenue to the Make-A-Wish Foundation, a    non-profit creating life-changing wishes for children with critical illnesses.

summary: Will I get 1 free Juiced Genie for every Genie I hold?
paragraph: Yes. We will announce a date shortly after mint where holders will get 1 JuJu    Juice Veil airdropped to them. But BEWARE!! Contents are toxicâ€¦ and the new set of    Genies will be crazier, stronger, and some may even be mutated!!!
The discord will open immediately upon sellout and serve as the direct line of    communication with our holders.
